p.text: Human face plays an important role in extraction of individual's emotion state.
Current Music players have features such as play, play next, play previous, pause, shuffle
Therefore we aim to build an application that focuses on reducing human efforts by generating a playlist based
Manually segregating the list of songs and generating an appropriate playlist based on an individual's emotion feature is tedious.
may not match the mood of the user.
Emotion based Music players now in use are less accurate, time consuming and do not
This system will generate a playlist based on the facial expression extracted from captured image of the person
The project is to develop an Emotion Based Music Player,which is an android application meant for users to minimize their efforts in managing large playlists.
The proposed model will extract user’s facial expressions and features to determine the current mood of the user.
Once the emotion Is detected, playlist of songs suitable to the mood of the user will
Image of the user is captured through camera and stored.
The image is converted to a binary image format, put into bitmap and then processed by performing mathematical calculations.
In this module,the List of files in the sdcard forms the input.
Emotions extracted for the songs are stored as a meta-data in the database (form of a hashmap)
Mapping is performed by querying the meta-data database.

The future scope in the system would to design a mechanism that would be helpful in music therapy treatment and provide the music therapist the help needed to treat the patients suffering from disorders like mental stress, anxiety, acute depression and trauma.
The proposed system also tends to avoid in future
the unpredictable results produced in extreme bad light conditions and very poor
[1] Emotion Based Music Player by Nikhil Zaware,Tejas Rajgure, Amey Bhadang, D.D Sapkal.
Chin-Han Chen, Ming-Fang Weng, Shyh-Kang Jeng, and Yung-Yu Chuang
Facial features have been categorized into two major categories such as Appearance-based feature extraction and Geometric based feature extraction.
Various techniques and approaches have been proposed and developed to classify human emotional state of behavior.
Microsoft Oxford Project is an API,
using which, we can detect face points, like mouth corners, eye locations, closed/open lids and determine a relation between these elements
Android is a software platform and an operating system based on linux operating system
The system involves the image processing and facial detection processing, uses
Songs are read from the MediaStore which keeps itself updated using the MediaScanner provided by the Android OS.
Categorized songs are displayed in respective fragments as a list.
